description: Transforming the market for efficient lighting in Russia

subproject.description: The goal of the project is to reduce GHG emissions in Russia by improving energy efficiency related to lighting. The objective of the project is to transform the lighting market in Russia through promotion of EEL technologies and systems, and phasing-out inefficient lighting. To reach the above goal and objective, the project seeks four outcomes: (1) Improved efficient lighting standards and policy frameworks; (2) Supply chain for energy efficient lighting is strengthened; (3) Energy efficient lighting is increased in Moscow residential and public buildings; (4) Energy-efficient street lighting is adopted in Nizhny Novgorod region.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Lighting Energy Efficiency

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
